dict.acceptation: 贫穷；缺乏，不足；贫瘠，不毛；低劣；

sent.orig: City poverty relatives to country poverty and it researches the poverty of townsman.
sent.trans: 城市贫困是相对于农村贫困而言的，它主要研究城镇内非农业人口的贫困问题。

sent.orig: Disease often goes with poverty/Disease and poverty often go together.
sent.trans: 疾病与贫穷常相伴而生。

sent.orig: Pro-poor-tourism, in contrast to traditional poverty-elimination, is an innovative and brand-new way of poverty-elimination.
sent.trans: 相对于传统扶贫而言，旅游扶贫是一种全新的扶贫方式。

sent.orig: Consequently, casting off intellectual poverty is the only way that intellectual economy times off all poverty.
sent.trans: 因而，摆脱知识贫困是知识经济时代摆脱一切贫困的必由之路。

sent.orig: Poverty is man-created and it is in our hands to destroy poverty.
sent.trans: 贫穷是人为的，因此我们能消灭贫穷。
